Oops we did it again....Dropping another rad release, that is!

Just a small update this time that fixes minor issues reported by users. Thanks again!

- New Look: A complete redesign of the Ground News brand and products.
- Ground Summaries: proprietary AI technology condenses related articles into a brief summary of the issue, giving you the key details in neutral language.
- Quick Read: Tap the book icon next to a headline to instantly open and read an article. 
- Across the Spectrum: Quickly compare how a Left, Center and Right publication is reporting on the same issue without sifting through numerous sources. 
- Recommended Coverage: Browse a selection of related articles from diverse perspectives that are tailored to your reading habits.
- Factuality: A score that looks at the reporting practices of a news publication using a combination of ratings from third-party news monitoring organizations.
- Global Coverage: See how the same story is being covered across the globe. 
- Enhanced Filters: You asked and we listened. You can now filter paywalled sources, sort news by bias and factuality rating, and quickly prioritize between local and international coverage. 

Try it out and let us know what you think! feedback@groundnews
